languages.text: "Империум до смешного неоригинален на методы воспитания. Исправительные работы в шахтах? Такие места не щадят ни взрослых, ни детей".
"The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."
languages.original_text: "Империум до смешного неоригинален на методы воспитания. Исправительные работы в шахтах? Такие места не щадят ни взрослых, ни детей".

traits.locale_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “帝国在教育方面只会生搬硬套，这实在是太可笑了。送到矿场里进行劳改？在这种地方，根本不会有人被仁慈以待，无论是大人还是孩子。”
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: “帝国在教育方面只会生搬硬套，这实在是太可笑了。送到矿场里进行劳改？在这种地方，根本不会有人被仁慈以待，无论是大人还是孩子。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «El Imperium no es nada original con sus métodos correctivos. ¿Trabajo de reeducación en las minas? Estos lugares no muestran piedad por nadie, adulto o niño».
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: «El Imperium no es nada original con sus métodos correctivos. ¿Trabajo de reeducación en las minas? Estos lugares no muestran piedad por nadie, adulto o niño».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「帝国の教育方法は、バカバカしいほどに古典的だわ。鉱山での強制労働ですって？こんな場所には、大人だろうと子どもだろうと、慈悲はないわね」
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の教育方法は、バカバカしいほどに古典的だわ。鉱山での強制労働ですって？こんな場所には、大人だろうと子どもだろうと、慈悲はないわね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Das Imperium ist hinsichtlich seiner erzieherischen Methoden lachhaft unoriginell. Strafarbeit in den Minen? Orte wie dieser gewähren niemandem Gnade, egal, ob Erwachsenem oder Kind."
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: "Das Imperium ist hinsichtlich seiner erzieherischen Methoden lachhaft unoriginell. Strafarbeit in den Minen? Orte wie dieser gewähren niemandem Gnade, egal, ob Erwachsenem oder Kind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « L'Imperium manque tellement d'originalité dans ces méthodes pédagogiques que c'en est risible. L'enseignement de la vertu de la discipline dans une mine ? Adulte ou enfant, quiconque est envoyé ici ne trouvera rien d'autre que la souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

traits.locale_text: « L'Imperium manque tellement d'originalité dans ces méthodes pédagogiques que c'en est risible. L'enseignement de la vertu de la discipline dans une mine ? Adulte ou enfant, quiconque est envoyé ici ne trouvera rien d'autre que la souffrance. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İmparatorluk eğitim yöntemleri konusunda gülünç derecede banal. İşçileri madende çalıştırıp ıslah etmek mi? Bu tip yerler yetişkin olsun çocuk olsun kimseye merhamet etmez."
languages.original_text: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."
